sentence: As fans know, Zach Nichols and Jemmye Carroll have often traded blows on social media but their last dispute appeared to be the final straw for Emilee Fitzpatrick of “The Real World: Cancun.” It all started with an interview Jemmye gave on the “Mike Lewis Podcast” where she said her issues with Zach stemmed from comments he’d made on social media.
